item.description:
Ok... so here's an interesting event....

Ricardo from Ricardo's Cafe Trattoria (Lowell, MA0 will host a wine tasting... introducing us to the lost wines of Italy.... sounds intriguing doesn't it! One of our members, John, has graciously offered to host the tasting at his loft. Ricardo will come over and we will serve some well-paired cheeses to the wines being offered.

Creme di Christi
Taurisi
Alianico
Flanghia

Then, we will walk over and have dinner at Ricardo's place where the chef will prepare a special entree to complement the wine tasting. Of course, you can also order off the menu if you that is your preference.

Hope to see you there! Directions and specific location information to John's loft in Lowell will be provided to guests who have RSVP'd for the event.

Sharon
item.name: Lost Wines of Italy
